name: DroidFest Version 2.0
description: You are a space ship being chased by droids. The ship follows your mouse. Not much else. Don't Worry. This game is free. Because why would I force you to pay for my trash game? That would just be cruel. REMINDER: THIS GAME IS IN ALPHA STAGES WITH AN UPDATE COMING. THIS IS NOT THE FINAL PROJECT. IT IS A VERY EARLY VERSION.      Also : Check out  Duncadoo0. He's the man who made the awesome tunes.
